items.sentence: Tom and Mary met three years before Tom died.
Tom and Mary see each other almost every day.
Tom asked Mary if she knew where his car was.
Tom asked Mary to meet him at the front gate.
How about having dinner outside this evening?
Nothing makes me happier than being with you.
Tom has a secret that he's never told anyone.
I want to make sure that Tom know what to do.
Everybody here except me has lived in Boston.
That amount of money could buy a lot of food.
